attributes.action: commission an urgent inquiry into the demise of indigenous Children's Television programmes on British Television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ITV has ceased production of programmes for children. It has also ceased transmitting children's programmes during the traditional weekday teatime slot. The demise of children's television production in the UK will deny children access to our rich British culture. The government need to act urgently to prevent this crisis in children's television.
